name: Starter Game in Pico 8
description:
Thanks a million to mboffin (https://mboffin.itch.io) for the great youtube tutorial that led me to create basically the absolute basics of a game in Pico 8.

I wanted to start doing a few more things than Bitsy could handle and Pico 8 looked like a good direction to in for now. I like the idea of editing everything in one environment and having access to a range of colour too.

The aim is to get the key and cross the bridge. It is far from difficult. Please give me any and all feedback!
